Reeve was born in Williamstown, Massachusetts. The third child of Superman (1978 film series character) actor Christopher Reeve and only child of Dana Reeve, Will was only 2 years old when his father suffered a devastating injury while riding a horse and was paralyzed. He later joined the GMA team, already leaving a huge impression on the loyal audience.
